error.message: Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\slides_presentation\PresentationListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.

Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\slides_presentation\PresentationListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\slides_presentation\SlideListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\slides_presentation\SlideListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\slides_presentation\SlideListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to slides_presentation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
